name: Pauvre Pierrot
description: One night&comma Arlequin come to see his lover Colombine. But then Pierrot knocks at the door and Colombine and Arlequin hide. Pierrot starts singing but Arlequin scares him and the poor man goes away.

When the waitress comes back with the beer&comma the wanderer begins to court her. Meanwhile the kitchen boy comes&comma drinks the beer unnoticed and vanishes. description: James J. Corbett and Peter Courtney meet in a boxing exhibition.

name: Edison Kinetoscopic Record of a Sneeze
description: A man (Thomas Edison's assistant) takes a pinch of snuff and sneezes. This is one of the earliest Thomas Edison films and was the first motion picture to be copyrighted in the United States.

description: The adventures of a female reporter in the 1890s.

name: Leaving the Factory
description: Workers leaving the Lumière factory for lunch in Lyon&comma France in 1895; a place of great photographic innovation and one of the birth places of cinema.
